rules.description: Esc to Control-g in Emacs only

manipulators.description: Open Alacritty terminal with Hyper + t
Open Emacs with Hyper + e
Open Slack with Hyper + s
Open Firefox with Hyper + f
Open chat github repo with Hyper + u
Open calendar.google.com with Hyper + c
Open Google Chrome with Hyper + g
Print full screen with Hyper + p
Open iTunes with Hyper + m
Decrement volume with Hyper + -
Increment volume with Hyper + =
Play or pause music with Hyper + '
Move to next track  with Hyper + .
Move to previous track with Hyper + ,
Down arrow  with Hyper + j
Up arrow with Hyper + k
Left arrow with Hyper + h
Right arrow with Hyper + l
Copy entire Emacs buffer with C-c b c
Repeat command in Emacs with C-x z
Copy line in Emacs with C-c y
Quit Emacs with C-x C-c
Show Emacs bookmarks with C-x r b
Find matching end parantheses Emacs  with C-A-f
Find matching end parantheses Emacs  with C-A-b
